tool_description: This service provides for data from African Stock Exchanges.
name: African Exchanges APIs
title: African Exchanges APIs

api_list.name: Cape Town Stock Exchange Issuer Debts
api_list.description: Cape Town Stock Exchange Issuer Debts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://african-exchanges-apis.p.rapidapi.com/south-africa/issuer-debts/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "african-exchanges-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
